summary: A biography of Ian Dury, who was stricken with polio at a young age and defied expectations by becoming one of the founders of the punk-rock scene in Britain in the 1970s.

keywords: pub rock|flashback|punk rock|car accident|reference to paul mccartney
title: Sexo, drogas y rock'n roll
